result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerry D. Baty

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: to Judge Huber from J.B. - stj
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 1:33 p.m. 
**Includes 15CF96, 14CF967, 14CM1059, 15CF117 & 14TR5242**
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears in custody with Attorney Dave Casey.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief filed. 
State files Amended Complaint and Information in 14CF967. COURT accepts Amended Complaint & Information. 
Defendant wishes to waive Preliminary Hearing in 14CF967. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.
State moves to: 15CF96- DRI Ct.2- Bail Jumping (Misd) & DRI Ct.3- Bail Jumping (Misd)
                           14CF967- DRI Ct.2- Hit & Run, DRI Ct.3- Bail Jumping (Misd), DRI Ct.4- Bail Jumping (Misd) & DRI Ct.5- Bail Jumping (Misd)
                           14CM1059- DRI Ct.1- Battery & DRI Ct.2- Disorderly Conduct
                           15CF117- DRI Ct.1- Bail Jumping (Misd) 
COURT GRANTS. 
OTR: 1:43 p.m. 
BOTR: 1:49 p.m. 
PLEA: 15CF96- Ct.1 OWI 4th>>GUILTY 
           14CF967- Ct.1 OWI 5th>>GUILTY
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made: a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 15CF96- Ct.1>>4 years WI State Prison System- 2 year IC & 2 years ES I/S consecutive to 14CF967. 3 years probation concurrent to 14CF967. CONDITIONS: 6 months MCJ with huber for work and treatment consecutive to 14CF967, participate and successfully complete OWI Court, 36 month DL revocation with credit for any time admin. suspended, any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 36 months; as is the defendant himself, half-priced IID ordered, AODA and any follow-up, absolute sobriety, 6 points on DL, $2,252.00 fine inclusive.
14CF967- Ct.1>>4 1/2 years WI State Prison System- 2 1/2 years IC & 2 years ES I/S consecutive to 15CF96. 3 years probation concurrent to 15CF96. CONDITIONS: 9 months MCJ with huber for work and treatment with 3 months stayed for rules violations consecutive to 15CF96, participate in OWI Court, 36 month DL revocation with credit for any time admin. suspended, any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 36 months; as is the defendant himself, half-priced IID ordered, AODA and any follow-up, absolute sobriety, 6 points on DL, $2,252.00 fine inclusive, restitution in the amount of $500.00. 
Defendant is entitled to 117 days credit in 14CF967.
Adj: 2:03 p.m.
BOTR: 2:06 p.m. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo for ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears in custody with Attorney Dave Casey. 
State moves to dismiss 14TR5242.
COURT GRANTS. 
Adj: 2:06 p.m.

Case Called: 9:37 am  
Includes 14CF967 and 15CF117.
State appears by ADA Chad Minder; Deft appears in custody and with Atty Dave Casey.
15CF177>>State moves to amend charge in Information to Ct. 1 (Misdemeanor BJ) and bond to be continued. COURT AMENDS charge from Ct. 1 (Felony BJ) to Ct. 1 (Misdemeanor BJ). 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY
Bond:Continues
Adj: 9:40 am
C: Br. 2
Pre-trial conference on March 11, 2015 at 10:00 am.
subpoena mailed to C.M. for Preliminary Hearing set 2-11-15
INCLUDES 15CF117, 14CF967.  Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 - 1 day of release.  No alcohol.
